instruction: Provide an explanation for why the given statement is true.
input: Artificial Intelligence can help improve decision making.
output: Artificial Intelligence can help improve decision making by providing automated and accurate analysis of data, enabling businesses to make data-driven decisions. AI-driven algorithms can also identify patterns and correlations in the data, and can suggest the best course of action based on desired outcomes. Furthermore, AI can help in automating certain routine tasks, freeing up human resources to focus on more important and complex tasks. Thus it is clear why AI can contribute to better decision-making.
